solution_line_template: After the first day, Ezekiel had {total_hike_distance} - {first_day_distance} = <<{total_hike_distance}-{first_day_distance}={remaining_after_day1}>>{remaining_after_day1} kilometers of the hike left.
On the second day, he covered {total_hike_distance} / {half_divisor} = <<{total_hike_distance}/{half_divisor}={second_day_distance}>>{second_day_distance} kilometers.
